description: Primes p such that x^39 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049571 relative to A000040.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^39 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[150]], ok ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 20 2012  *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(850) | forall{x: x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^39 ne 2 }]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 20 2012
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 27 2001
